articles.description: LOS ANGELES —  K-Pop band BTS was the big winner at the American Music Awards on Sunday just four years after making their first appearance on the fan-voted show.

articles.title: BTS becomes first Asian act to win top honour at American Music Awards - The Star Online
articles.description: The septet clinched the award beating out five big names – Ariana Grande, Drake, Olivia Rodrigo, Taylor Swift and The Weeknd. –
